src/biotic.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* compute biological source minus sink terms according to OCMIP protocol */
00002 
00003 #include <stdio.h>
00004 #include <math.h>
00005 #include "init.h"
00006 #include "step.h"
00007 
00008 extern const double misval;
00009 
00010 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
00011 extern const double parm_n15_std_fraction;
00012 extern const double parm_alpha_n15_prod;
00013 extern const double parm_alpha_n15_pon_remin;
00014 extern const double parm_alpha_n15_don_remin;
00015 extern const double parm_alpha_n15_denitw;
00016 extern const double parm_alpha_n15_denits;
00017 extern const double parm_alpha_n15_n2fix;

00020 #ifdef PHOSPHATE 
00021 
00022 extern double ****tr;
00023 extern double D[NXMEM][NYMEM];
00024 extern double h[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00025 extern double po4_star_lev[NZPHOS][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00026 extern double po4_star_lay[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00027 extern double Temptm[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00028 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00029 extern double fe_lev[NZPHOS][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00030 extern double fe_lay[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00031 extern double par_lay[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00032 extern double sfc_swr[NXMEM][NYMEM];
00033 extern double ***lightlim;
00034 #  ifdef NITRATE
00035 extern double ***nitrlim;
00036 #  endif
00037 extern double ***ironlim;
00038 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00039 # ifdef NITRATE
00040 extern double no3_lev[NZPHOS][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00041 extern double no3_lay[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00042 # endif
00043 extern double dt;
00044 extern double jpo4[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];

00046 extern double jremdop[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00047 extern double jprod[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];

00049 extern double flux_pop[NXMEM][NYMEM];
00050 #ifdef OXYGEN

00055 extern double Ro18o16[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00056 #endif
00057 #ifdef NITRATE
00058 extern double jno3[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00059 extern double jdon[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00060 extern double jremdon[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00061 extern double jprod_n[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00062 extern double jn2fix[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00063 extern double jremin_n[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00064 extern double jdenitw[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00065 extern double jdenits[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00066 extern double flux_pon[NXMEM][NYMEM];
00067 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
00068 extern double jno3_15n[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
00069 extern double jdon_15n[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];

00071 extern double jprod_15n[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];

00073 extern double flux_pon_15n[NXMEM][NYMEM];

00075 #endif /* NITRATE */
00076 #ifdef DIC
00077 extern double ***jdic;
00078 extern double ***jalk;

00082 extern int mDOP;

00085 extern int mOXYGEN;

00100 
00101 void biotic_sms(int ibiodt)
00102 {
00103     int i, j, k, l, kjunk;
00104     int kcomp, kmax; 
00105     double po4obsprof[NZPHOS], junk;
00106 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00107     double feobsprof[NZPHOS];
00108 # endif
00109     double compensation_depth, martin_coeff, fracprod;
00110     double phi_p, kappa_p, phi_ca;
00111     extern const double r_bio_tau;
00112     double c_2_p, caco3_2_c, n_2_p;
00113     double depth[NZ];
00114     double dtop[NZ], dbot[NZ];
00115     double fp[NZ], zremin[NZ];
00116     double fca[NZ], zreminca[NZ];
00117     double jdop_ij[NZ], jpo4_ij[NZ], jca[NZ];
00118     double jdic_ij[NZ], jalk_ij[NZ], jprod_ij[NZ];
00119     double jremin_ij[NZ], jremdop_ij[NZ];
00120     double flux_caco3;
00121     double imbal, flux_rem;
00122     double D_ij, dt_bio, frac_dt_bio;
00123     double po4[NZ], dop[NZ]; 
00124     double flux_pop_ij, flux_sed_ij, fclog, fdlog;
00125 # ifdef NITRATE
00126     const double r_N_P = 16.0;
00127     const double r_N_P_diaz = r_N_P;
00128     const double r_N_P_denit = 104.0;
00129     double phi_n, kappa_n;
00130     double jno3_ij[NZ], jdon_ij[NZ], jprodN_ij[NZ];
00131     double jn2fix_ij[NZ], jdenitw_ij[NZ], jdenits_ij[NZ], jreminN_ij[NZ], jremdon_ij[NZ];
00132     double fp_n[NZ];
00133     double no3[NZ], don[NZ];
00134     double flux_pon_ij;
00135 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00136     double jno3_15n_ij[NZ], jdon_15n_ij[NZ], jprodN_15n_ij[NZ], jreminN_15n_ij[NZ], jremdon_15n_ij[NZ];
00137     double jdenitw_15n_ij[NZ], jdenits_15n_ij[NZ], jn2fix_15n_ij[NZ], Rn15n14[NZ];
00138     double no3_15n[NZ], don_15n[NZ];
00139     double flux_pon_15n_ij, fp_15n[NZ];
00140 #  endif
00141 # endif /* NITRATE */
00142 #ifdef OXYGEN
00143     double o2[NZ], jo2_ij[NZ]; 
00144     const double o2_min = 5.e-3; // -1000.;
00145     const double o_2_p = -150.;
00146 #endif
00147 #ifdef OXY18
00148     double o18[NZ], jo18_ij[NZ], Ro18o16[NZ];
00149     const double Rsmow = 0.0020052; 
00150     const double alpha_resp = 0.982; 
00151     //    ratio_sw = 0.97704;
00152     //ratio_o2_sw = 1.00075;
00153 #endif
00154 
00155     int nzlevitus = NZPHOS;
00156     double levitus_depths[NZPHOS] = {0, 10, 20, 30, 50, 75, 100, 
00157                                     120, 150, 200, 250, 300, 400, 500, 600,
00158                                     700, 800, 900, 1000, 1100, 1200, 1300, 
00159                                     1400, 1500, 1750, 2000, 2500, 3000, 
00160                                     3500, 4000, 4500, 5000, 5500};
00161 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00162     double light_lim[NZ];
00163     double t_lim[NZ];
00164     double fe_lim[NZ];
00165     double po4_lim[NZ];
00166 #  ifdef NITRATE 
00167     double no3_lim[NZ];
00168 #  endif
00169     extern double lambda0; // mol/(m3 s)
00170     double lambda[NZ];
00171     const double par_frac = 0.45; // as in BEC model
00172     const double k_sw = 0.04; // 1/m
00173     extern double k_I; // W/m2
00174     extern double par_b; // 1/dgC
00175     extern double k_PO4; // mol/m3
00176 #  if defined NITRATE && defined CALC_R_N_P
00177     const double k_NO3 = 0.5e-3; // mol/m3
00178 #  endif
00179 #  ifdef NITRATE
00180     const double k_NO3_diaz = 5.e-3; // mol/m3
00181     const double gamma_diaz = 0.1;
00182 #  endif
00183     extern double k_Fe; // mol/m3
00184 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00185 //BX # ifdef NITRATE
00186     const double eps_lim = 1.e-9; // since (po4/dt)*dt is NOT exactly == po4!!
00187 //BX # endif
00188 
00189     phi_p = 0.67;
00190     kappa_p = 1.0 / (1.0 * 360.0 * 86400.0);
00191     phi_ca = phi_p;
00192 # ifdef NITRATE
00193     phi_n = phi_p; // 0.67;
00194     kappa_n = kappa_p; //1.0 / (1.0 * 360.0 * 86400.0);
00195 # endif
00196     martin_coeff = 0.9;
00197     //r_bio_tau    = 1.0 / (30.0 * 86400.0);    // restoring time step
00198     compensation_depth = 75.0;
00199     n_2_p     = 16.0;
00200     caco3_2_c = 0.07; 
00201     c_2_p     = 117.0;
00202 
00203     dt_bio = dt / (double) ibiodt;
00204     frac_dt_bio = 1.0 / (double) ibiodt;
00205 
00206     printf("conc_obs_layer(h,po4_star_lev,po4_star_lay)\n");
00207     conc_obs_layer(h,po4_star_lev,po4_star_lay);
00208 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00209 #  ifdef NITRATE
00210     // nitrate
00211     printf("conc_obs_layer(h,no3_lev,no3_lay)\n");
00212     conc_obs_layer(h,no3_lev,no3_lay);
00213 #  endif
00214 
00215     // iron
00216     printf("conc_obs_layer(h,fe_lev,fe_lay)\n");
00217     conc_obs_layer(h,fe_lev,fe_lay);
00218 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00219 
00220 // the outer loops
00221     for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
00222         for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
00223             double hsum;
00224 
00225 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00226  *  Compute depth at middle, top and bottom of layers (depth, dtop, dbot)
00227  *  Find index of compensation depth (kcomp) 
00228  *  Find index of deepest layer with h>5m (kmax)
00229  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00230 
00231             for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00232                 depth[k] = 0.0;
00233             }
00234 // compute depth at layer k as the depth of the point in the 
00235 //  middle of that layer
00236             D_ij = D[i][j]; // create local variable
00237             if (D_ij > MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00238                 hsum = h[0][i][j];
00239                 depth[0] = hsum * 0.5;
00240                 for (k=1;k<NZ;k++) {
00241                     depth[k] = hsum + 0.5 * h[k][i][j]; 
00242                     hsum += h[k][i][j];
00243                 }
00244             } else { 
00245                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00246                     depth[k] = misval;
00247                 }
00248             }
00249             for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00250                 dtop[k] = depth[k] - 0.5 * h[k][i][j];
00251                 dbot[k] = depth[k] + 0.5 * h[k][i][j];
00252             }
00253 
00254             kmax = NZ - 1;
00255             kjunk = NZ - 1;
00256             while (h[kjunk][i][j] < 5.0 && kjunk > 0) {
00257                 kmax = --kjunk;
00258             }
00259           
00260             kcomp = 0;
00261             kjunk = 0;
00262             while (dtop[kjunk] < compensation_depth && 
00263                    kjunk <= kmax) {
00264                 kcomp = kjunk++;
00265             }
00266           
00267 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00268  *     calculate remin curves for OM and CaCO3
00269  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00270 
00271             for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00272                 if (k < kcomp) {
00273                     zremin[k] = 0.0;
00274                     zreminca[k] = 0.0;
00275                 } else if (k >= kcomp && k < kmax) {
00276                     junk = (dbot[k] / compensation_depth); 
00277                     zremin[k] = pow(junk,-martin_coeff);
00278                     zreminca[k] = exp(-(dbot[k]-compensation_depth)/3500.0);
00279                 } else if (k >= kmax) {
00280                     zremin[k] = 0.0;
00281                     zreminca[k] = 0.0;
00282                 }
00283             }
00284 
00285 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------
00286  *     copy tracers to local arrays
00287  *---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00288 
00289             for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00290                 po4[k] = tr[mPHOSPHATE][k][i][j];
00291                 dop[k] = tr[mDOP][k][i][j];
00292 # ifdef NITRATE
00293                 no3[k] = tr[mNITRATE][k][i][j];
00294                 don[k] = tr[mDON][k][i][j];
00295 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00296                 no3_15n[k] = tr[mNITRATE_15n][k][i][j];
00297                 don_15n[k] = tr[mDON_15n][k][i][j];
00298                 if (no3[k] > 0.0)
00299                   Rn15n14[k] = no3_15n[k] / no3[k];
00300                 else
00301                   Rn15n14[k] = 0.0;
00302 #  endif
00303 # endif /* NITRATE */
00304 # ifdef OXYGEN
00305                 o2[k] = tr[mOXYGEN][k][i][j];
00306 # endif
00307 #  ifdef OXY18
00308                 o18[k] = tr[mO18][k][i][j];
00309                 Ro18o16[k] = o18[k] / o2[k];
00310 #  endif
00311 
00312             }
00313 
00314 /* ---------------------------------------------------
00315  *  loop over ibiodt time steps
00316  * -------------------------------------------------*/
00317 
00318             for (l=1; l<=ibiodt; l++) { 
00319 
00320 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00321  *     Production
00322  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00323 
00324 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00325                 if (D_ij > compensation_depth) {
00326                   // light
00327                   for (k=0; k <= kcomp && k < NZ; k++) {
00328                     par_lay[k][i][j] = par_frac * sfc_swr[i][j] /
00329                       ((dbot[k] - dtop[k]) * k_sw) *
00330                       (exp(-k_sw * dtop[k]) - exp(-k_sw * dbot[k]));
00331                     
00332                     light_lim[k] = par_lay[k][i][j] / 
00333                       (par_lay[k][i][j] + k_I);
00334                     
00335                     t_lim[k] = exp(par_b * Temptm[k][i][j]);
00336 
00337                     if (po4[k] < 0.0) {
00338                       po4_lim[k] = 0.0;
00339                     } else
00340                       po4_lim[k] = po4[k] / (po4[k] + k_PO4);
00341 
00342 
00343                     fe_lim[k] = fe_lay[k][i][j] /
00344                       (fe_lay[k][i][j] + k_Fe);
00345 
00346                     lambda[k] = lambda0 * t_lim[k] * light_lim[k] * fe_lim[k];
00347                     jprod_ij[k] = lambda[k]  * po4_lim[k];
00348 
00349                     // limit production to available PO4
00350                     if (jprod_ij[k] > 0.0 && jprod_ij[k] > ((po4[k]-eps_lim)/dt) ) {
00351                       if ( (po4[k]-eps_lim)/dt > 0.0)
00352                         jprod_ij[k] = (po4[k]-eps_lim)/dt;
00353                       else // prevent jprod from being negative
00354                         jprod_ij[k] = 0.0;
00355                     }
00356                   } // end of loop over k
00357                 } else { // D_ij <= compensation_depth
00358                   for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {
00359                     jprod_ij[k] = 0.0;
00360                     light_lim[k] = 0.0;
00361                     po4_lim[k] = 0.0;
00362                     fe_lim[k] = 0.0;
00363                   }               
00364                 }
00365 
00366 # else /* not PROGNOSTIC, i.e., diagnostic model */
00367 
00368                 for (k = 0; k <= kcomp && k < NZ; k++) {
00369                     if (po4[k] > po4_star_lay[k][i][j] && 
00370                         po4_star_lay[k][i][j] >= 0.0 &&
00371                         D_ij > compensation_depth)   {
00372                         jprod_ij[k] = (po4[k] - po4_star_lay[k][i][j]) * r_bio_tau;
00373                     } else
00374                         jprod_ij[k] = 0.0;
00375                 }
00376 
00377 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00378 
00379                 for (k = kcomp+1; k < NZ; k++) {
00380                     jprod_ij[k] = 0.0;
00381 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00382                     light_lim[k] = 0.0;
00383                     po4_lim[k] = 0.0;               
00384                     fe_lim[k] = 0.0;                
00385 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00386                 }
00387 
00388 # ifdef NITRATE
00389 #  ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00390                 if (D_ij > compensation_depth) {
00391                   for (k = 0; k <= kcomp && k < NZ; k++) {
00392 #   ifdef SPEC_R_N_P
00393                     no3_lim[k] = 1.0; // set mostly for output
00394                     
00395                     jprodN_ij[k] = jprod_ij[k] * r_N_P;
00396                     if (jprodN_ij[k] > 0.0 && jprodN_ij[k] > ((no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt) ) {
00397                       if ( (no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt > 0.0)
00398                         jprodN_ij[k] = (no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt;
00399                       else // prevent jprodN from being negative
00400                         jprodN_ij[k] = 0.0;
00401                       // adjust PO4 drawdown accordingly
00402                       jprod_ij[k] = jprodN_ij[k] / r_N_P;
00403                     }
00404 #   endif /* SPEC_R_N_P */
00405 #   ifdef CALC_R_N_P
00406                     if (no3[k] > 0.0)
00407                       no3_lim[k] = no3[k] / (no3[k] + k_NO3);
00408                     else
00409                       no3_lim[k] = 0.0;
00410                     jprodN_ij[k] = lambda[k] * no3_lim[k];
00411                     // limit production to available NO3
00412                     if (jprodN_ij[k] > 0.0 && jprodN_ij[k] > ((no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt) ) {
00413                       if ( (no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt > 0.0)
00414                         jprodN_ij[k] = (no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt;
00415                       else // prevent jprodN from being negative
00416                         jprodN_ij[k] = 0.0;
00417                     }
00418 #   endif /* CALC_R_N_P */
00419                     // N2 fixation
00420                     jn2fix_ij[k] = lambda[k] * po4_lim[k] * 
00421                       (1.0 - no3[k]/(no3[k] + k_NO3_diaz)) *
00422                       gamma_diaz * r_N_P_diaz;
00423                   } // end of loop over k
00424                 } else { // D_ij <= compensation_depth
00425                   for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {
00426                     jprodN_ij[k] = 0.0;
00427                     no3_lim[k] = 0.0;
00428                     jn2fix_ij[k] = 0.0;
00429 #   ifdef N15_CYCLE
00430                     jprodN_15n_ij[k] = 0.0;
00431 #   endif
00432                   }               
00433                 }
00434 #  else /* diagnostic model */
00435                 for (k = 0; k <= kcomp && k < NZ; k++) {
00436                   double prod_diff;
00437                   if (no3[k] > no3_lay[k][i][j] && no3_lay[k][i][j] >= 0.0 &&
00438                         D_ij > compensation_depth) {
00439                       jprodN_ij[k] =  (no3[k] - no3_lay[k][i][j]) * r_bio_tau;
00440                     } else
00441                       jprodN_ij[k] = 0.0;
00442 
00443                   // N2 fixation
00444                   prod_diff = jprod_ij[k] - jprodN_ij[k] / r_N_P;
00445                   //              jn2fix_ij[k] = prod_diff > 0.0 ? prod_diff * r_N_P_diaz : 0.0;
00446                   jn2fix_ij[k] =  Temptm[k][i][j] > 25.0 ? 100e12/14/3.15e7/1.4e16 : 0.0;
00447                 }
00448 #  endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00449 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00450                 for (k = 0; k < NZ; k++) {
00451                   if (no3[k] > 0.0 && no3_15n[k] > 0.0)
00452                     jprodN_15n_ij[k] = jprodN_ij[k] * Rn15n14[k] * parm_alpha_n15_prod;
00453                   else
00454                     jprodN_15n_ij[k] = 0.0;
00455                 }
00456 #  endif
00457                 for (k = kcomp+1; k < NZ; k++) {
00458                     jprodN_ij[k] = 0.0;
00459                     jn2fix_ij[k] = 0.0;
00460 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00461                     jprodN_15n_ij[k] = 0.0;
00462 #  endif
00463                 }                   
00464 # endif /* NITRATE */
00465 
00466                 if (kcomp >= 0) {
00467                     fracprod = (compensation_depth - dtop[kcomp]) /
00468                         h[kcomp][i][j];
00469                     jprod_ij[kcomp] *= fracprod;
00470 # ifdef NITRATE             
00471                     jprodN_ij[kcomp] *= fracprod;
00472                     jn2fix_ij[k] *= fracprod;
00473 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00474                     jprodN_15n_ij[kcomp] *= fracprod;
00475 #  endif
00476 # endif /* NITRATE */
00477                 }
00478 
00479 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00480  *     Sinking Particle Flux
00481  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00482 
00483 /*       calculate the sinking flux at the compensation depth */
00484                 flux_pop_ij = (1.0 - phi_p) * jprod_ij[0] * h[0][i][j];
00485                 for (k=1; k<NZ; k++) {
00486                     flux_pop_ij += (1.0 - phi_p) * jprod_ij[k] * h[k][i][j];
00487                 }
00488 /*       distribute sinking flux with depth */
00489                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00490                     fp[k] = flux_pop_ij * zremin[k];
00491 # ifdef NITRATE
00492                 flux_pon_ij = (1.0 - phi_n) * jprodN_ij[0] * h[0][i][j];
00493                 for (k=1; k<NZ; k++) {
00494                     flux_pon_ij += (1.0 - phi_n) * jprodN_ij[k] * h[k][i][j];
00495                 }
00496                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00497                     fp_n[k] = flux_pon_ij * zremin[k];
00498 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00499                 flux_pon_15n_ij = (1.0 - phi_n) * jprodN_15n_ij[0] * h[0][i][j];
00500                 for (k=1; k<NZ; k++) {
00501                     flux_pon_15n_ij += (1.0 - phi_n) * jprodN_15n_ij[k] * h[k][i][j];
00502                 }
00503                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00504                     fp_15n[k] = flux_pon_15n_ij * zremin[k];
00505 #  endif /* N15_CYCLE */
00506 # endif /* NITRATE */
00507             
00508 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00509  *     Particle Remineralization
00510  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00511 
00512                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00513                     if (k < kcomp) 
00514                         jremin_ij[k] = 0.0;
00515                     else if (k == kcomp) 
00516                         jremin_ij[k] = (flux_pop_ij - fp[k]) / h[k][i][j];
00517                     else // no need to check that k > kcomp
00518                         jremin_ij[k] = (fp[k-1] - fp[k]) / h[k][i][j];
00519 
00520                     //CAD - Are these checks really needed?
00521                     /* prevent large concentrations in layers of negligible thickness */
00522                     if (h[k][i][j] < 1.0e-9)
00523                         jremin_ij[k] = 0.0;
00524                 }
00525             
00526 /*       bottom boundary condition for shallow grid points (D < 75m) */
00527 
00528                 if (D_ij < compensation_depth && D_ij > MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00529                     jremin_ij[kmax] = flux_pop_ij / h[kmax][i][j];
00530                     // printf("D < comp_depth at grid point %i,%i \n",i,j);
00531                 }
00532 # ifdef NITRATE
00533                 for (k = 0; k < NZ; k++) {
00534                     if (k < kcomp) 
00535                         jreminN_ij[k] = 0.0;
00536                     else if (k == kcomp) 
00537                         jreminN_ij[k] = (flux_pon_ij - fp_n[k]) / h[k][i][j];
00538                     else // no need to check that k > kcomp
00539                         jreminN_ij[k] = (fp_n[k-1] - fp_n[k]) / h[k][i][j];
00540 
00541                     /* prevent large concentrations in layers of negligible thickness */
00542                     if (h[k][i][j] < 1.0e-9)
00543                         jreminN_ij[k] = 0.0;
00544                 }
00545             
00546 /*       bottom boundary condition for shallow grid points (D < 75m) */
00547 
00548                 if (D_ij < compensation_depth && D_ij > MINIMUM_DEPTH)
00549                     jreminN_ij[kmax] = flux_pon_ij / h[kmax][i][j];
00550 
00551                 /* water column denitrification */
00552                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00553                   if (o2[k] < o2_min) {
00554                     jdenitw_ij[k] = jremin_ij[k] * r_N_P_denit;
00555                     if (jdenitw_ij[k] > ((no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt)-jprodN_ij[k] ) {
00556                       if ( (no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt > 0.0)
00557                         jdenitw_ij[k] = (no3[k]-eps_lim)/dt - jprodN_ij[k];
00558                       else
00559                         jdenitw_ij[k] = 0.0;
00560                     }
00561                   } else
00562                     jdenitw_ij[k] = 0.0;
00563                 }
00564 
00565                 /* sediment denitrification */
00566                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00567                   jdenits_ij[k] = 0.0;
00568                 }                   
00569                 if (D_ij > compensation_depth && flux_pop_ij > 0.0) {
00570                   junk = dbot[kmax] / compensation_depth; 
00571                   flux_sed_ij = flux_pop_ij * pow(junk,-martin_coeff);
00572                   fclog = log(flux_sed_ij * c_2_p * 1.e2 * 86400.0); // log of Corg flux in umol/cm2/d
00573                   fdlog = -0.9543 + 0.7662 * fclog - 0.2350 * pow(fclog,2.0); // log of sed dn flux Middelburg
00574                   jdenits_ij[kmax] = exp(fdlog) / (1.e2 * 86400.0 * h[kmax][i][j]);  // denit rate uM/sec
00575                   if (jdenits_ij[kmax] > 0.0 && 
00576                       jdenits_ij[kmax] > 
00577                       ((no3[kmax]-eps_lim)/dt - jdenitw_ij[kmax] - jprodN_ij[kmax]) ) {
00578                     if ( (no3[kmax]-eps_lim)/dt > 0.0)
00579                         jdenits_ij[kmax] = (no3[kmax]-eps_lim)/dt - jdenitw_ij[kmax] - jprodN_ij[kmax];
00580                       else
00581                         jdenits_ij[k] = 0.0;
00582                   }
00583                 }
00584                 
00585 
00586 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00587                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00588                     if (k < kcomp) 
00589                         jreminN_15n_ij[k] = 0.0;
00590                     else if (k == kcomp) 
00591                         jreminN_15n_ij[k] = (flux_pon_15n_ij - fp_15n[k]) / h[k][i][j] *
00592                           parm_alpha_n15_pon_remin;
00593                     else // no need to check that k > kcomp
00594                         jreminN_15n_ij[k] = (fp_15n[k-1] - fp_15n[k]) / h[k][i][j] *
00595                           parm_alpha_n15_pon_remin;
00596 
00597                     /* prevent large concentrations in layers of negligible thickness */
00598                     if (h[k][i][j] < 1.0e-9)
00599                         jreminN_15n_ij[k] = 0.0;
00600                 }
00601             
00602 /*       bottom boundary condition for shallow grid points (D < 75m) */
00603 
00604                 if (D_ij < compensation_depth && D_ij > MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00605                     jreminN_15n_ij[kmax] = flux_pon_15n_ij / h[kmax][i][j] *
00606                       parm_alpha_n15_pon_remin;  // CAD - Will this conserve 15N mass?
00607                 }
00608 
00609                 /* water column denitrification */
00610                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00611                     jdenitw_15n_ij[k] = jdenitw_ij[k] * Rn15n14[k] * parm_alpha_n15_denitw;
00612                 }
00613 
00614                 /* sediment denitrification */
00615                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00616                   jdenits_15n_ij[k] = 0.0;
00617                 }
00618                 jdenits_15n_ij[kmax] = jdenits_ij[kmax] * Rn15n14[k] * parm_alpha_n15_denits;
00619 
00620                 /* N2 fixation */
00621                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00622                     jn2fix_15n_ij[k] = jn2fix_ij[k] * parm_n15_std_fraction *
00623                       parm_alpha_n15_n2fix;
00624                 }
00625 
00626 #  endif /* N15_CYCLE */
00627 # endif /* NITRATE */
00628 
00629 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00630  *     PO4 and DOP
00631  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00632                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00633                   jremdop_ij[k] = kappa_p * dop[k];
00634                   jpo4_ij[k] = -jprod_ij[k] + jremin_ij[k] + jremdop_ij[k];
00635                   jdop_ij[k] = phi_p * jprod_ij[k] - jremdop_ij[k];
00636                 }
00637 
00638 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00639  *     NO3 and DON
00640  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00641 # ifdef NITRATE
00642 
00643                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00644                   jremdon_ij[k] = kappa_n * don[k];
00645                   jno3_ij[k] = -jprodN_ij[k] + 
00646                     jreminN_ij[k] + jremdon_ij[k] + 
00647                     jn2fix_ij[k] - jdenitw_ij[k] - jdenits_ij[k];
00648                   jdon_ij[k] = phi_n * jprodN_ij[k] - jremdon_ij[k];
00649                 }
00650 
00651 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00652  *     NO3_15N and DON_15N
00653  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00654 
00655 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
00656 
00657                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00658                   if (don[k] > 0.0 && don_15n[k] > 0.0)
00659                     jremdon_15n_ij[k] = jremdon_ij[k] * don_15n[k] / don[k] *
00660                       parm_alpha_n15_don_remin;
00661                   else
00662                     jremdon_15n_ij[k] = 0.0;
00663 
00664                   jdon_15n_ij[k] = phi_n * jprodN_15n_ij[k] - jremdon_15n_ij[k];
00665                   jno3_15n_ij[k] = -jprodN_15n_ij[k] + 
00666                     jreminN_15n_ij[k] + jremdon_15n_ij[k] +
00667                     jn2fix_15n_ij[k] - jdenitw_15n_ij[k] - jdenits_15n_ij[k];
00668                 }
00669 
00670 # endif /* N15_CYCLE */
00671 
00672 #endif /* NITRATE */
00673 
00674 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00675  *     O2 / O18
00676  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00677 
00678 # ifdef OXYGEN
00679                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00680                   if (o2[k] < o2_min && jpo4_ij[k] > 0.0) {
00681                     jo2_ij[k] = 0.0;
00682                   } else {
00683                     jo2_ij[k] = o_2_p * jpo4_ij[k];
00684                   }
00685                 }
00686 
00687 # endif /* OXYGEN */
00688 
00689 
00690 #  ifdef OXY18
00691                 for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00692                   if (o2[k] < o2_min && jpo4_ij[k] > 0.0) {
00693                     jo18_ij[k] = 0.0;
00694                   } else {
00695                     jo18_ij[k] = -o_2_p * (jprod_ij[k] * Rsmow -
00696                                         (jremin_ij[k] + jremdop_ij[k]) *
00697                                         Ro18o16_ij[k] * alpha_resp);
00698                   }
00699                 }
00700 
00701 #  endif
00702 
00703 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00704  *     CaCO3
00705  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00706 
00707 /*  calculate the flux of CaCO3 from the compensation depth to bottom*/
00708 
00709                 flux_caco3 = caco3_2_c * c_2_p * flux_pop_ij;
00710                 for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {
00711                     fca[k] = flux_caco3 * zreminca[k];
00712                 }
00713 
00714 /*  calculate formation/dissolution of CaCO3 above/below compensation depth */
00715                 for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {
00716                     if (k < kcomp) 
00717                         jca[k] = -caco3_2_c * c_2_p * (1.0 - phi_ca) * jprod_ij[k];
00718                     else if (k == kcomp) 
00719                         jca[k] = -caco3_2_c * c_2_p * (1.0 - phi_ca) * jprod_ij[k] + 
00720                             (flux_caco3 - fca[k]) / h[k][i][j];
00721                     else // no need to check that k > kcomp
00722                         jca[k] = (fca[k-1] - fca[k]) / h[k][i][j];
00723                     /* prevent large concentrations in layers of negligible thickness */
00724                     if (h[k][i][j] < 1.0e-9)
00725                         jca[k] = 0.0;
00726 
00727                 }
00728 
00729 /*       bottom boundary condition for shallow grid points (D < 75m) */
00730                 if (D_ij < compensation_depth && D_ij > MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00731                     jca[kmax] = flux_caco3 / h[kmax][i][j];
00732                     // printf("D < comp_depth at grid point %i,%i \n",i,j);
00733                 }
00734 
00735 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00736  *     DIC
00737  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00738                 for (k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00739                     jdic_ij[k] = c_2_p * jpo4_ij[k] + jca[k];
00740 
00741 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00742  *     ALK
00743  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00744                 for (k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00745                     jalk_ij[k] = -n_2_p * jpo4_ij[k] + 2.0 * jca[k];
00746 
00747 
00748 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00749  *       check for mass conservation in sinking/remin fluxes
00750  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00751 
00752 
00753                 flux_rem = jremin_ij[0] * h[0][i][j];
00754                 for (k=1; k<NZ; k++) {
00755                     flux_rem += jremin_ij[k] * h[k][i][j];
00756                 }
00757 
00758                 imbal = flux_rem - flux_pop_ij;
00759                 if (flux_pop_ij < 0.0)
00760                   printf("flux_pop[%d][%d] = %g\n", i, j, k, flux_pop_ij);
00761                 if (fabs(imbal) > flux_pop_ij*1e-4) { /* error tolerance = 0.01% */
00762                     printf("mass imbalance (P) at grid point %i,%i \n",i,j);
00763                     printf("flux_pop,flux_rem,imbal,D,kcomp,kmax = %g,%g,%g,%g,%i,%i \n",
00764                            flux_pop_ij,flux_rem,imbal,D_ij,
00765                            kcomp,kmax);
00766                 }
00767 
00768 #ifdef NITRATE
00769 
00770                 flux_rem = jreminN_ij[0] * h[0][i][j];
00771                 for (k=1; k<NZ; k++) {
00772                     flux_rem += jreminN_ij[k] * h[k][i][j];
00773                 }
00774 
00775                 imbal = flux_rem - flux_pon_ij;
00776                 if (flux_pon_ij < 0.0)
00777                   printf("flux_pon[%d][%d] = %g\n", i, j, flux_pon_ij);
00778                 if (fabs(imbal) > flux_pon_ij*1e-4) { /* error tolerance = 0.01% */
00779                     printf("mass imbalance (N) at grid point %i,%i \n",i,j);
00780                     printf("flux_pon,flux_rem,imbal,D,kcomp,kmax = %g,%g,%g,%g,%i,%i \n",
00781                            flux_pon_ij,flux_rem,imbal,D_ij,
00782                            kcomp,kmax);
00783                 }
00784 # ifdef N15_CYCLE
00785                 flux_rem = jreminN_15n_ij[0] * h[0][i][j];
00786                 for (k=1; k<NZ; k++) {
00787                     flux_rem += jreminN_15n_ij[k] * h[k][i][j];
00788                 }
00789 
00790                 imbal = flux_rem - flux_pon_15n_ij;
00791                 if (flux_pon_15n_ij < 0.0)
00792                   printf("flux_pon_15n[%d][%d] = %g\n", i, j, flux_pon_15n_ij);
00793                 if (fabs(imbal) > flux_pon_15n_ij*1e-4) { /* error tolerance = 0.01% */
00794                     printf("mass imbalance (15N) at grid point %i,%i \n",i,j);
00795                     printf("flux_pon_15n,flux_rem,imbal,D,kcomp,kmax = %g,%g,%g,%g,%i,%i \n",
00796                            flux_pon_15n_ij,flux_rem,imbal,D_ij,
00797                            kcomp,kmax);
00798                 }
00799 # endif /* N15_CYCLE */
00800 # endif /* NITRATE */
00801 
00802 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00803  *     save fluxes to 3d fields
00804  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00805 
00806                 for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {
00807                   po4[k]  += dt_bio * jpo4_ij[k];  //CAD - why are these here? 
00808                     dop[k]  += dt_bio * jdop_ij[k];
00809 
00810                     // copy fluxes from local 1D to global 3D variables
00811                     jpo4[k][i][j]    += (jpo4_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio);
00812                     jdop[k][i][j]    += jdop_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00813                     jremdop[k][i][j] += jremdop_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00814                     jprod[k][i][j]   += jprod_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00815                     jremin[k][i][j]  += jremin_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00816 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
00817                     lightlim[k][i][j]  += light_lim[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00818 #  ifdef NITRATE
00819                     nitrlim[k][i][j]  += no3_lim[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00820 #  endif
00821                     ironlim[k][i][j]  += fe_lim[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00822 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
00823 # ifdef NITRATE
00824                     jno3[k][i][j]    += jno3_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00825                     jn2fix[k][i][j]  += jn2fix_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00826                     jdenitw[k][i][j] += jdenitw_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00827                     jdenits[k][i][j] += jdenits_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00828                     jdon[k][i][j]    += jdon_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00829                     jremdon[k][i][j] += jremdon_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00830 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00831                     jno3_15n[k][i][j]    += jno3_15n_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00832                     jdon_15n[k][i][j]    += jdon_15n_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00833                     jremdon_15n[k][i][j] += jremdon_15n_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00834 #  endif
00835 # endif /* NITRATE */
00836 # ifdef DIC
00837                     jdic[k][i][j]    += jdic_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00838                     jalk[k][i][j]    += jalk_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00839 # endif
00840 # ifdef OXYGEN
00841                     jo2[k][i][j]    += (jo2_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio);
00842 # endif
00843 # ifdef OXY18
00844                     jo18[k][i][j]    += jo18_ij[k] * frac_dt_bio;
00845 # endif
00846 
00847                 }
00848 //BX added if loop - only positive statement before
00849 //BX   not used any more if mn_fields are set to misval in offtrac.c
00850 //BX            if (D_ij > MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00851                 flux_pop[i][j] += flux_pop_ij * frac_dt_bio;
00852 //BX            } else {
00853 //BX                flux_pop[i][j] = misval;
00854 //BX            }
00855 //BX-a
00856 /*       bottom boundary condition for shallow grid points (D < 75m) */
00857 //BX            if (D_ij < compensation_depth && D_ij > MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00858 //BX              for (k=0; k<NZ; k++) {jalk[k][i][j] = 0;}
00859 //BX                //printf("D < comp_depth at grid point %i,%i\n",i,j);
00860 //BX            }
00861 //BX-e
00862 
00863 # ifdef NITRATE
00864                 flux_pon[i][j] += flux_pon_ij * frac_dt_bio;
00865 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
00866                 flux_pon_15n[i][j] += flux_pon_15n_ij * frac_dt_bio;
00867 #  endif
00868 # endif /* NITRATE */
00869 
00870 
00871 
00872             } // end of loop over l
00873         } // end of loop over j
00874     } // end of loop over i
00875 } // end of subroutine biotic_sms

00877 # endif /* PHOSPHATE */
